chapters.title: Chapter 47: A Teaching Chamber
chapters.info: Selucia, p. 702—Tuon's Truthspeaker, and her Voice now that she has removed the veil and been raised Empress, becoming Fortuona. She kept the right side of her head shaved clean, the other side braided, while Tuon was merely the heir; now that she is Empress, Selucia shaves the left side and is growing out the right. She is the one who shaves Fortuona's head every morning. She has golden hair, piercing blue eyes, skin the color of buttery cream, and an “impressive” bosom. See also Paendrag, Fortuona Athaem Devi; Paendrag, Tuon Athaem Kore.
